title: robber dog:Video: A Dog Entered A Supermarket In Brazil And Was Caught On Camera Stealing A Bag Of Doughnuts
text:
Who said only humans can be good at robbing stores? A video of a dog nonchalantly entering a mall, stealing a bag of doughnuts and making a run for it, is going viral. Reportedly, the particular supermarket in Brazil had been robbed thrice in very recently, the fourth time the thief turned out to be a dog.

The mischievous pooch was caught on camera, when it entered the area and calmly left with the bag, as if it were no big deal.

The owner of the supermarket, Paulo Cardoso, said that the dog made its way to the exit, even as people started shouting the moment they saw the canine running around with a bag of doughnuts in its mouth.





The dog reportedly dropped the bag right outside the store and ran with all its might, as it probably got scared by the yelling customers. But that was not the end of the story of the dog. It returned the next day, but got a warm treatment from the employees who fed it.

“Customers thought it was fantastic for a dog to 'rob' a market. Me too, because I had never seen it. It is unheard of. But the puppy will become a customer if he does [return]. Let's take care of him,” Cardoso reportedly said.

Ah well, something good did come of the dog's attempts to rob the store. We're glad the people decided to be kind to it.
